sub_title: Professor @ Erasmus MC | co-founder @ Kaminari Medical | BME | Cardiovascular | Innovator | Mentor
summary:
Gijs van Soest (1974) is an experimental physicist specialized in light propagation, optics and lasers. He is currently working as a biomedical engineer in cardiology. His work focuses on the development of "cardiovascular photonics": optical diagnostic and therapeutic techniques in cardiology.

Specialties: Optical coherence tomography, photoacoustic imaging, intravascular ultrasound, vulnerable plaque, atherosclerosis, stents

http://scholar.google.nl/citations?user=Z7d88BgAAAAJ&hl=en&oi=ao
